content.p:
ยง 911. Advance deposit wagering. The commission shall study the impact
of advance deposit wagering on horse racing and pari-mutuel handle in
New York state. The study shall include but not be limited to the impact
of out-of-state entities accepting wagers from New York state residents,
the annual dollar amount wagered by New York state residents through
out-of-state advance deposit wagering accounts, the number of
out-of-state advance deposit wagering accounts held by New York state
residents, and information concerning New York state residents who
utilize out-of-state advance deposit wagering accounts, including, but
not limited to, residency. The commission shall submit the study,
together with any recommendations, to the governor and legislature no
later than September fifteenth, two thousand twelve.
